name: Spark (itch) (axolodal)
description:
Made for Mini Jam 73: Power!

My second submitted game to a game jam. Was finally able to kinda finish another thing this time.

Unfortunately pretty short cause I ran out of time at the end!

Not sure how stable MacOSX is as I don't have a mac computer to test on.

Click the crystals to move to a power box. Press ESC to open the menu in-game.

Created in Godot 3.1

Sprites made with Aseprite

SFX made with bfxr

Music made with FL Studio
